      • getBlogPostPageResult

        public com.jalios.jcms.db.PageResult getBlogPostPageResult​(java.lang.String orderBy,
                                                           boolean isDescending,
                                                           int firstResult,
                                                           int maxResults,
                                                           com.jalios.jcms.Member mbr,
                                                           boolean showDrafts,
                                                           com.jalios.jcms.Member author)
        Returns a PageResult of BlogPost for the current Blog
        Parameters:
        orderBy - the orderBy criteria (e.g. "lastPostDate", "title", ...)
        isDescending - if true perform a descending sort.
        firstResult - set the first conversation to retrieve. If <= 0, rows will be retrieved beginnning from first blog post.
        maxResults - set the maximum number of conversations to retrieve. If < 0, there is no limit to the number of posts retrieved.
        mbr - the logged member
        showDrafts - true to also see post in draft state
        author - the post author (may be null)
        Returns:
        a PageResult of BlogPost for the current Blog
